name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic layered rice dish with spiced chicken. The crown jewel of Indian and Pakistani cuisine.

instructions.instruction: Wash and soak rice for 30 minutes.
Marinate chicken with yogurt, garlic, ginger, turmeric, chili, garam masala and salt. Rest 1 hour.
Heat oil in a large pot. Fry onions until deep golden brown.
instructions.tip: This step is crucial - takes 15-20 minutes.

instructions.instruction: Remove half the fried onions for garnish.
Add marinated chicken, cook 10 minutes, turning occasionally.
Parboil drained rice in salted water until 70% done. Drain.
Layer rice over chicken. Drizzle saffron milk, add mint and cilantro.
Cover tightly (seal lid), cook on very low heat for 25 minutes.
Garnish with fried onions and fresh herbs. Serve.

tips: Dum (steam) cooking is the secret - don't open the lid.
Seal lid with dough for authentic dum.
Quality saffron makes a huge difference.
storageInfo: Refrigerate 3 days. Reheat in microwave or steamer.
servingSuggestion: Serve with raita, pickles and papadum.
variations: Make vegetable biryani with cauliflower and peas.
Use lamb - cooking time will be longer.
Add hard-boiled eggs for extra protein.
